WorkItem.Description:
As title says, CN has its own and TW 
 http://cn.wowarmory.com/
So Could you update for the function "Loading from BN.net"?

Comments.Message:
We've transitioned to the new Blizzard API. TW support should be added with next version of Rawr, CN depending on whether Blizzard adds support for it by that time.

If you could post an example character realm/name that would be helpful so we can test if there are any issues.

I'm sure the Chinese Armory has APIs but i don't know the details. Because I have used a modified version of Rawr which can load from CN battle.net when we were stiil in WLK.....
Here is an example(we have been in CTM 4.1 for 3 weeks ,but it seems that the CN armory didn't update yet.....maybe it will update to CTM soon.. ) 
realm:瑞文戴尔
CharacterName:恶灵召唤
website:http://cn.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=%E7%91%9E%E6%96%87%E6%88%B4%E5%B0%94&cn=%E6%81%B6%E7%81%B5%E5%8F%AC%E5%94%A4

By the way, How can i translate the Rawr in Chinese?Especially for Gears Database..... did you supply a way for us to do it? It's OK for me to use English Rawr but not for others Chinese fans.... I think you can use lua include in your Rawr, So we can just modifier lua text file to translate it

If you're talking about item names translations we had support for that in Rawr 2. The way we used to do it was by using wowhead. There's no Chinese version of wowhead so that way it's not possible at the moment. After Blizzard API includes items it might be possible to get translations from there.

Oh,Chinese armory has changed.... the old one is no longer used....
http://www.battlenet.com.cn/wow/zh/character/%E7%91%9E%E6%96%87%E6%88%B4%E5%B0%94/%E6%81%B6%E7%81%B5%E5%8F%AC%E5%94%A4/simple

as for translation, i mean that you can just supply a way for us to translate, and Rawr's fans like me will do the tanslation instead of you.....just like Addons in WOW

If you mean translation of the actual program, I'm not sure how feasible that would be. It would involve quite a large change to both base code and actual models as it wasn't designed initially with that in mind.
Yeah,I know it's difficult,  item names translation is enough. actual program translation is required but not necessary......So do your best is OK
